content.body: I may need to split up the Function Decorators proposal into two presentations and may split the proposal itself, after plenary. The current proposal includes functions *and* object literal elements, but that's a lot to cover and I have a feeling we will spend a long time discussing function declarations.
content.formatted_body: I may need to split up the Function Decorators proposal into two presentations and may split the proposal itself, after plenary. The current proposal includes functions and object literal elements, but that's a lot to cover and I have a feeling we will spend a long time discussing function declarations.

content.body: This is encouragement for you to come to San Diego to get extra time with other delegates to talk about Decorators and tacos.

> <@rbuckton:matrix.org> I may need to split up the Function Decorators proposal into two presentations and may split the proposal itself, after plenary. The current proposal includes functions *and* object literal elements, but that's a lot to cover and I have a feeling we will spend a long time discussing function declarations.

I am happy that you are raising these together. It isn‚Äôt always great to have lots of tiny proposals.
content.formatted_body:
In reply to @rbuckton:matrix.org
I may need to split up the Function Decorators proposal into two presentations and may split the proposal itself, after plenary. The current proposal includes functions and object literal elements, but that's a lot to cover and I have a feeling we will spend a long time discussing function declarations.
I am happy that you are raising these together. It isn‚Äôt always great to have lots of tiny proposals.

content.body: I know I'm going to at least need to amend my timebox to something longer.
